system.description:
You share a kinship with the weavers of silken strands, and similarly enjoy the deadly beauty of the web. You ignore the movement restrictions imposed by webs and automatically succeed on any saving throws caused by the web spell or similar effects.

In addition, once you are at least a 3rd-level druid you learn the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.hsjqquspwko9n5jl]{Web} which counts as a druid spell for you.
